channel.title: CVE Feed for Stormhill Media -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Stormhill Media -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-48331|2023-11-30T12:54:27.072Z -- stormhill%20media -- mybooktable%20bookstore%20by%20stormhill%20media
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Stormhill Media MyBookTable Bookstore by Stormhill Media allows Cross Site Request Forgery.This issue affects MyBookTable Bookstore by Stormhill Media: from n/a through 3.3.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-29772|2024-06-04T17:56:55.988Z -- stormhill%20media -- mybooktable%20bookstore
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Stormhill Media MyBookTable Bookstore allows Stored XSS.This issue affects MyBookTable Bookstore: from n/a through 3.3.7.
